products.name: 2x4 Timber
products.description: Standard 2x4 lumber for framing and general construction. This versatile softwood lumber is perfect for building walls, floors, and roofs. Made from high-quality pine, it's kiln-dried to reduce warping and splitting. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor projects when properly treated. Meets all building code requirements for structural applications.

products.name: 2x6 Timber
products.description: Durable 2x6 lumber for construction and decking applications. This premium grade lumber offers excellent strength-to-weight ratio, making it perfect for floor joists, ceiling beams, and deck framing. The larger dimension provides superior load-bearing capacity compared to 2x4s. Pre-treated options available for outdoor use.

products.name: 2x8 Timber
products.description: Strong 2x8 lumber ideal for floor joists and structural beams. This heavy-duty lumber can span longer distances without additional support, making it perfect for large rooms and open floor plans. Excellent for load-bearing applications including headers, beams, and rafters. Kiln-dried for dimensional stability.

products.name: 2x10 Timber
products.description: Premium 2x10 lumber used in wide framing applications and heavy-duty construction. Perfect for floor joists in larger spans, providing exceptional strength and minimal deflection. Commonly used in commercial construction and large residential projects. This grade lumber ensures long-lasting performance in demanding structural situations.

products.name: Sheathing Plywood
products.description: High-quality 4x8 foot sheathing plywood, engineered for roofing and wall applications. This structural grade plywood provides excellent strength and weather resistance when used as subflooring, roof decking, or wall sheathing. Made with moisture-resistant adhesives and featuring smooth surface for easy installation.

products.name: Hardwood Boards
products.description: Premium hardwood boards measuring 1 inch thick, ideal for furniture making and finish carpentry. Smooth, durable surface perfect for staining or painting. Offers excellent strength and long-lasting performance in interior applications.

products.name: MDF Boards
products.description: Smooth medium-density fiberboard (MDF) sheets, 3/4 inch thick, perfect for cabinetry, shelving, and decorative projects. Provides an even surface for painting and easy machining with standard woodworking tools.

products.name: Hardwood Plywood
products.description: 4x8 foot hardwood plywood sheet with smooth finish, suitable for cabinetry and fine woodworking. Made from premium hardwood veneers for superior strength and appearance. Ideal for furniture, paneling, and decorative applications.

products.name: Chisel Variety Pack
products.description: Assorted chisel set perfect for fine woodworking and carving projects. Includes multiple sizes with durable, comfortable handles for precise control and lasting use.

products.name: Hand Saw
products.description: Compact hand saw designed for quick, clean cuts in wood and light materials. Lightweight and comfortable grip ideal for both beginners and professionals.

products.name: Wood Glue
products.description: High-strength wood glue for bonding various wood types. Dries clear with minimal clamp time. Ideal for furniture repairs, joinery, and woodworking projects requiring durable adhesion.

products.name: Tape Measure
products.description: 25-foot retractable tape measure with durable casing and clear, easy-to-read markings. Magnetic hook end helps secure to metal surfaces for one-person measurements.

products.name: Power Drill
products.description: Cordless power drill with variable speed trigger and keyless chuck for versatile drilling and driving applications. Includes rechargeable battery, charger, and basic drill bit set. Compact design with LED work light for improved visibility in dark spaces. Perfect for furniture assembly, picture hanging, and general home repairs.

products.name: Sander
products.description: Compact electric sander for smoothing wood surfaces with ease. Features dust collection bag and ergonomic handle for comfortable extended use. Ideal for furniture refinishing and DIY projects.

products.name: Nails (100pcs)
products.description: Complete set of 100 high-quality steel nails suitable for a variety of construction and woodworking projects. These durable nails are designed for strong holding power and resistance to bending. Ideal for framing, carpentry, and general repairs. Compatible with most hammers and nail guns for easy application. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

products.name: Screws (100pcs)
products.description: Set of 100 multi-purpose steel screws for wood, drywall, and metal projects. Designed for strong grip and corrosion resistance. Suitable for indoor and outdoor use with most power drivers.

products.name: Brushes Variety Pack
products.description: Assorted set of paint brushes for interior and exterior painting. Includes multiple sizes and shapes to handle detailed trim work and broad surface coverage. Durable bristles provide smooth, even paint application.

products.name: Paint Tray
products.description: Sturdy plastic paint tray designed to hold standard one-gallon paint cans. Features textured rolling surface for even paint distribution and easy cleanup.

products.name: Painters Tape
products.description: High-quality painter's tape for clean, sharp paint lines. Adheres well to a variety of surfaces and removes cleanly without residue. Ideal for indoor and outdoor painting projects.

products.name: Drop Cloth
products.description: Protective plastic drop cloth for covering floors, furniture, and surfaces during painting projects. Lightweight and tear-resistant, providing excellent coverage to prevent paint spills and splatters.

products.name: Interior Paint
products.description: Premium latex interior paint with excellent coverage and durability. This one-gallon container provides rich, even color with superior hide and washability. Low-odor formula dries quickly to a smooth, professional finish. Available in flat, satin, and semi-gloss sheens for various room applications.

products.name: Exterior Stain
products.description: High-quality exterior wood stain designed to protect and enhance the natural beauty of wood surfaces. This one-gallon container provides excellent UV protection and water resistance. Perfect for decks, fences, and outdoor furniture. Available in a variety of colors to suit your project.

products.name: Caulk
products.description: Flexible acrylic caulk perfect for sealing gaps around windows, doors, and trim. This paintable caulk adheres to most surfaces and remains flexible after curing. Easy to apply with standard caulk gun and tools off cleanly with soap and water. Excellent for both interior and exterior weatherproofing applications.

products.name: Paint Roller
products.description: High-quality paint roller designed for smooth application of interior and exterior paints. Features a durable roller cover for even coverage and a comfortable handle for easy use. Suitable for walls, ceilings, and large surfaces.

products.name: Trowel
products.description: Durable garden trowel with ergonomic handle for easy digging, planting, and soil aeration. Perfect for small gardening tasks and container planting.

products.name: Pick
products.description: Sturdy garden pick tool designed to break hard soil and remove roots or rocks. Strong steel head and comfortable grip for effective garden prep work.

products.name: Shears
products.description: Sharp garden shears with ergonomic handles for precise trimming and pruning of shrubs, flowers, and hedges. Durable blades stay sharp through regular use.

products.name: Mulch
products.description: Natural hardwood mulch for landscaping and garden bed applications. This 2-cubic-foot bag provides excellent moisture retention and weed suppression around plants and trees. Naturally decomposes to enrich soil with organic matter. Rich brown color enhances curb appeal and complements most landscaping designs.

products.name: Trellis
products.description: Sturdy garden trellis for supporting climbing plants and vines. Made of weather-resistant materials, perfect for enhancing garden aesthetics and plant growth.

products.name: Garden Hose
products.description: Heavy-duty rubber garden hose designed for year-round outdoor use. This 50-foot hose features brass fittings and burst-resistant construction rated for high water pressure. Flexible in cold weather and kink-resistant design for easy handling. Perfect for lawn watering, car washing, and general outdoor cleaning tasks.

products.name: Fertilizer
products.description: Balanced lawn fertilizer promoting healthy grass growth and rich green color. This 40-pound bag covers up to 15,000 square feet with slow-release formula feeding for up to 12 weeks. Contains essential nutrients including nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium. Safe for children and pets when applied according to directions.

products.name: Watering Can
products.description: Lightweight watering can with a removable rose for gentle watering of flowers, seedlings, and houseplants. Durable plastic design suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

products.name: Tomato Seeds
products.description: Premium heirloom tomato seeds perfect for home gardening enthusiasts. These non-GMO seeds produce flavorful, juicy tomatoes with exceptional taste and texture. Suitable for both container gardening and traditional garden beds. High germination rate with detailed planting instructions included. Harvest fresh, organic tomatoes all season long.

products.name: Onion Seeds
products.description: Sweet onion seeds that are incredibly easy to grow in any garden setting. These varieties produce large, mild-flavored bulbs perfect for cooking and fresh eating. Long storage life when properly cured. Resistant to common onion diseases and adaptable to various soil conditions. Great for companion planting with tomatoes and peppers.

products.name: Basil Seeds
products.description: Fast-growing basil seeds yielding fragrant, flavorful leaves ideal for cooking and garnishing. Suitable for indoor pots or garden beds. Prefers warm weather and regular harvesting encourages bushier growth. Includes planting instructions to ensure a bountiful supply.

products.name: Squash Seeds
products.description: Heirloom butternut squash seeds that produce large, sweet, and nutty-flavored squash. Vining plants thrive in warm seasons with high yields. Perfect for roasting, soups, and storage. Includes detailed planting and care tips for a successful harvest.

products.name: Pepper Seeds
products.description: Easy-to-grow banana pepper seeds producing mild, sweet peppers perfect for fresh eating, pickling, and cooking. Plants yield abundant harvests with crisp texture and vibrant yellow color. Ideal for garden beds or containers. Includes planting instructions for best results.

products.name: Grass Seeds
products.description: Premium lawn grass seed blend designed for thick, green, and durable turf. Suitable for various climates and soil types. Provides fast germination and long-lasting, drought-resistant growth. Perfect for new lawns or overseeding existing grass.

products.name: Beet Seeds
products.description: High-quality beet seeds producing tender, sweet roots with vibrant red color. Easy to grow in garden beds or containers, these beets are perfect for roasting, salads, and juicing. Includes detailed planting and care instructions for a successful and abundant harvest.

products.name: Carrot Seeds
products.description: Sweet and crunchy carrot seeds that are easy to grow in garden beds or containers. Produces bright orange, tender roots with excellent flavor. Resistant to common pests and diseases. Ideal for fresh eating, cooking, and juicing. Includes planting and care instructions for best results.
